Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package etcd for versions less than 3.5.6-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package etcd for versions less than 3.5.6-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package etcd is earlier than 3.5.6-11, affected by CVE-2023-44487
